Network Traffic Restrictions

Oct 3, 2015

Iâ€™m giving a talk today at Ohio LinuxFest, on investigating network issues for home networks. The slides are available here.

It references a number of my packages:

  • netbwtools - Network bandwidth testing tools, with plottable CSV output
  • splitcpy - Copy files over the network using multiple parallel SSH streams
  • mrtg-probes - Monitor site download performance in MRTG
  • server-setup-scripts - Server setup scripts (SNMPd)
